dist/constants/strings.sql.migration.ir.page.title: Azure-Dienst zur Datenbankmigration
dist/constants/strings.sql.migration.ir.page.description: Azure Database Migration Service orchestrates database migration activities and tracks their progress. You can select an existing Database Migration Service as an Azure SQL target if you have created one previously, or create a new one below.
dist/constants/strings.sql.migration.ir.page.sql.migration.serv: No Database Migration Service found. Create a new one

Select a Database Migration Service that is connected to a node.

dist/constants/strings.sql.migration.dms.portal.info: Any existing Azure Database Migration Service in the Azure portal do not appear in Azure Data Studio. Any Database Migration Service created in Azure Data Studio will not be visible in the Azure portal yet.

dist/constants/strings.sql.migration.service.container.heading: Setup integration runtime
dist/constants/strings.sql.migration.service.container.containe: Azure Database Migration Service leverages Azure Data Factory's self-hosted integration runtime to upload backups from on-premises network fie share to Azure.
Follow the instructions below to setup self-hosted integration runtime.
dist/constants/strings.sql.migration.option: Laden Sie die Integration Runtime herunter, und installieren Sie sie.
dist/constants/strings.sql.migration.ir.setup.step2: Schritt 2: Verwenden Sie diesen Schlüssel zum Registrieren Ihrer Integration Runtime.
dist/constants/strings.sql.migration.ir.setup.step3: Step 3: Click on 'Test connection' button to check the connection between Azure Database Migration Service and integration runtime

dist/constants/strings.sql.migration.dashboard.description: Ermitteln Sie die Migrationsbereitschaft Ihrer SQL Server-Instanzen, identifizieren Sie ein empfohlenes Azure SQL-Ziel, und schließen Sie die Migration Ihrer SQL Server-Instanz zu Azure SQL Managed Instance oder SQL Server in Azure Virtual Machines ab.

dist/constants/strings.sql.migration.cannot.start.cutover.error: The cutover process cannot start until all the migrations are done. To return the latest file status, refresh your browser window.
dist/constants/strings.sql.migration.azure.sql.database.virtual: SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines
dist/constants/strings.sql.migration.completing.cutover.warning: Completing cutover without restoring all the backup(s) may result in a data loss.
dist/constants/strings.sql.migration.bc.info: A SQL Managed Instance migration cutover to the Business Critical service tier can take significantly longer than General Purpose because three secondary replicas have to be seeded for Always On High Availability group. The duration of the operation depends on the size of the data. Seeding speed in 90% of cases is 220 GB/hour or higher.
dist/constants/strings.sql.migration.cutover.help.main: Führen Sie die folgenden Schritte aus, bevor Sie die Übernahme abschließen.
dist/constants/strings.sql.migration.cutover.step.1: 1. Stop all incoming transactions to the source database.
dist/constants/strings.sql.migration.cutover.step.2.network.sha: 2. Take a final backup of the transaction log and store it in the network share location.
dist/constants/strings.sql.migration.cutover.step.2.blob: 2. Take a final differential or backup of the transaction log and store it in the Azure Storage Blob Container.
dist/constants/strings.sql.migration.cutover.step.3.network.sha: 3. Verify that your backup(s) have been restored on the target database. The "Log backup(s) pending restore" value should be zero.
dist/constants/strings.sql.migration.cutover.step.3.blob: 3. Verify that your backup(s) have been restored on the target database. The "Log backup(s) pending restore" value should be zero.
dist/constants/strings.sql.migration.confirm.checkbox.message: Ich bestätige, dass keine zusätzlichen Protokollsicherungen zur Verfügung stehen und die Übernahme abgeschlossen werden soll.
dist/constants/strings.sql.migration.cutover.in.progress: Übernahme für die Datenbank "{0}" in Bearbeitung
dist/constants/strings.sql.migration.cannot.cancel: Migration is not in progress and cannot be canceled.
